mapper.select: SELECT mav.user_name, mav.teach_name, mav.class_name, ac.is_first, ac.is_double_language, ac.is_weekend FROM additional_main am JOIN main_all_view mav ON am.additional_id = mav.additional_id JOIN additional_coefficients ac ON am.additional_coefficients_id = ac.additional_coefficients_id WHERE am.is_sure = 5 AND am.is_delete != 1
